ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Nifty REST T-Shirts
ygData.msgSnippet: Good grief.  Why does everyone equate REST with HTTP?  REST apps work quite well with file, ftp, gopher, wais, urn, ... I won t even mention waka in that list

Good grief.  Why does everyone equate REST with HTTP?  REST apps work
quite well with file, ftp, gopher, wais, urn, ...

I won't even mention waka in that list because it isn't done yet.
[Sorry, I got engaged the weekend before I gave the waka talk at
ApacheCon and wasn't prepared for the effect that has on work over
the holidays.]

....Roy
